content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our characters don't have nationalities or specific locations in mind during negotiations, I'll play my role as Peter Schmidt, the greedy landlord in Germany. As we discuss the rental price for this highly desired apartment in the city center, let me start with a slightly higher figure than market standards to test your reaction. I propose a rent of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the rental price proposal, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering my student budget and numerous available options in the area, I find this price slightly steep for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment. I would prefer to explore a more affordable alternative, potentially closer to market rates. Can we negotiate a reduced price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you insist on lowering the price significantly beyond what I had anticipated, reducing my potential profit margin. However, if you're determined to seek lower rents elsewhere, I wish you good luck in your search for a more suitable option. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
